org.digijava.kernel.viewmanager

Class AbstractViewConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.viewmanager.AbstractViewConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultViewConfigUtil, ViewConfigUtil

    public abstract class AbstractViewConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewConfig
    Ecnapsulates basic methods for file-based view configuration. Implementation is not a thread-safe!

      • isUpToDate

        public boolean isUpToDate()
        Description copied from interface: ViewConfig
        Returns true if configuration is up to date (no files were changed, etc). false if something was changed and reload is needed
        Specified by:
        isUpToDate in interface ViewConfig
        Returns:
        true if configuration is up to date, false - if not

      • expandLayoutInheritance

        protected void expandLayoutInheritance(SiteConfig siteConfig)
                                throws ViewConfigException
        Process layouts which extend other layouts. As the result, site configuration will contain expanded layouts (i.e. layouts which have all own and parent's properties)
        Parameters:
        siteConfig - site configuration
        Throws:
        ViewConfigException - if configuration error occurs

      • expandLayoutAndStore

        protected void expandLayoutAndStore(Layout layout,
                                    java.util.HashMap sourceLayout,
                                    java.util.HashMap destinationLayout)
                             throws ViewConfigException
        Expands given layout recursively
        Parameters:
        layout - layout to expand
        sourceLayout - source storage of layouts
        destinationLayout - destination storage of layouts
        Throws:
        ViewConfigException - if configuration error occurs
